sentence.Network_en: This is a highly debatable point.
sentence.Network_cn: 这是个爭议很大的问题.

entry.tran: 有争议的;有疑问的;未定的
entry.def: If you say that something is debatable, you mean that it is not certain.

example.ex: Whether we can stay in this situation is debatable...
example.tran: 在这种情况下我们能否留下还很难说。

example.ex: It is debatable whether or not antibiotics would make any difference...
example.tran: 抗生素能否起到什么作用还无法定论。

sentences.sentence: "If you ever get married, which seems to be extremely problematic"
